sentence.text: High expression of Chemokine receptor 4 (G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway) is important in tumor invasion, metastasis, drug-resistance and maintenance of stemness in non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC).

We therefore studied the molecular characteristics of drug-resistant G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway-positive cells on epithelial-mesenchymal transition (cytokine production) for the future identification of the tumor cells with the properties of both EMT and stemness.
